==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ちょう|しゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|徴|sc=Jpan}} (''chō'', "collect taxes or payment") + {{m|ja|収|sc=Jpan}} (''shū'', "collect")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちょうしゅう}}
# [[collection]], [[levy]]

====Compounds====
* [[源泉徴収]] (''gensen chōshū''): tax withholding at the source
* [[源泉徴収票]] (''gensen chōshū hyō''): tax certificate slip, statement of earnings, tax-income certificate

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ちょうしゅう}}

# [[collect]] [[taxes]], collect [[payment]]
